articles.author: LORNE COOK, SAMUEL PETREQUIN
articles.title: EU leaders face a new showdown with Hungary as they seek to unblock economic aid to Ukraine - The Associated Press
articles.description: A top European Union official says the 27 EU countries have sealed a deal to provide Ukraine with a new 50-billion-euro ($54 billion) support package despite weeks of threats from Hungary to veto the move. The agreement announced by European Council President…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The leaders of the 27 European Union countries sealed a deal Thursday to provide Ukraine with a new 50-billion-euro ($54 billion) support package for its war-ravaged economy despite wee… [+4474 chars]

articles.author: Charles Q. Choi
articles.title: 45000-year-old bones unearthed in cave are oldest modern-human remains in Central Europe - Livescience.com
articles.description: The finding suggests that 'successive pulses of small groups' of humans replaced Neanderthals in Europe starting around 45,000 years ago.
articles.content: Modern humans crossed the Alps into chilly Northern Europe about 45,000 years ago, meaning they may have coexisted with Neanderthals in Europe for thousands of years longer than experts previously th… [+6640 chars]

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.
